name: Flying colours n°4 (custom deck)
description: FieldCandy is an exciting design-led brand of tents. FieldCandy tents are fun. But they’re serious too. They keep you as dry in the rain and as snug in a gale as any conventional high performance tent. Enjoy my psychedelic tent "Intothewild" made with my artwork hypnotizer; This product is not for sale in this shop, but you can find available on Fieldcandy website.Buy now online!!

name: Wild Things (iPhone case 4/4s)
description:
This product is not for sale in this shop, but you can find available at Grove.Buy now online!!

Meticulously crafted from a single block of bamboo, the Grove iPhone 4/4S case is hand-sanded, filed and oiled to perfection like a classic piece of furniture.

name: Complex World (ipad skin&case by Grove)
description: This product is not for sale in this shop, but you can find available at Grove. After six months of prototyping, Grove is pleased to announce the release of two new iPad 2 accessories to join their existing line of hand crafted bamboo iPhone4 cases. The first option, a hard back case, merges a bamboo back and a customizable leather smart cover and is now available for pre​​order. The second, an engraved bamboo iPad skin, ad heres to the back of the iPad pro viding protection and style, and is available now.

name: Subrealistic Portrait
description:
Buy now 12"x17" (31x43 cm) Poster (inpsired by Dalì) printed in four colours on high quality Fedrigoni (Costellation Snow Raster) paper 170gr , Limited edition of 50, numbered and signed by the artist.

All shipments are guaranteed against damage, each poster is wrapped in protection paper before being placed in a sturdy, custom shipping tube and it is delivered with a certificate of authenticity.

name: Ocean
description:

All shipments are guaranteed against damage, each poster is wrapped in protection paper before being placed in a sturdy, custom shipping tube and it is delivered with a certificate of authenticity.
